EmailTemplate.name: Five days milestone Warner
EmailTemplate.subject: Gentle Reminder (Since 5 days Your Request is Pending) case# {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is to remind you that request {!Case.CaseNumber} has been pending for 5 days and awaits your response. We look forward to assisting you and hope to hear from you soon.
{!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
